news_header: A couple in north-east Pakistan has been detained for allegedly murdering a 13-year-old girl, Iqra, who worked as their maid after she was accused of stealing chocolates.
news_original_title: 'Died for stealing chocolate': Pakistan anger over death of child maid
news_text: Iqra died from multiple injuries, and the case has sparked outrage and discussions about child labor and the treatment of domestic workers in Pakistan. Despite laws against employing children under 15 as domestic workers, many are still exploited. Activists are calling for justice, highlighting systemic issues that allow such abuses to occur.
